The goal of this document is to get you up and running with `usdc` as quickly as possible.

## usdc basics
To pull the current circulation of usdc on different blockchains, simply call the name of the chain to get the current circulating amount of USDC.

```r
algorand()
```

```r
ethereum()
```

```r
solana()
```

```r
stellar()
```

```r
usdc_supply()
```
